Interface FieldInstruction

All Superinterfaces:
ClassFileElementPREVIEW, CodeElementPREVIEW, InstructionPREVIEW
public sealed interface FieldInstruction extends InstructionPREVIEW
FieldInstruction is a preview API of the Java platform.
Programs can only use FieldInstruction when preview features are enabled.
Preview features may be removed in a future release, or upgraded to permanent features of the Java platform.
Models a field access instruction in the code array of a Code attribute. Corresponding opcodes will have a kind of Opcode.Kind.FIELD_ACCESSPREVIEW. Delivered as a CodeElementPREVIEW when traversing the elements of a CodeModelPREVIEW.
Since:
22

    • of

      static FieldInstructionPREVIEW of(OpcodePREVIEW op, FieldRefEntryPREVIEW field)
      Returns a field access instruction.
      Parameters:
      op - the opcode for the specific type of field access instruction, which must be of kind Opcode.Kind.FIELD_ACCESSPREVIEW
      field - a constant pool entry describing the field
      Returns:
      a field access instruction

    • of

      static FieldInstructionPREVIEW of(OpcodePREVIEW op, ClassEntryPREVIEW owner, Utf8EntryPREVIEW name, Utf8EntryPREVIEW type)

      owner - the class holding the field
      name - the name of the field

    • of

      static FieldInstructionPREVIEW of(OpcodePREVIEW op, ClassEntryPREVIEW owner, NameAndTypeEntryPREVIEW nameAndType)
      Returns a field access instruction.
      Parameters:
      op - the opcode for the specific type of field access instruction, which must be of kind Opcode.Kind.FIELD_ACCESSPREVIEW
      owner - the class holding the field
      nameAndType - the name and field descriptor of the field
      Returns:
      a field access instruction
